overview.en: EON Protocol (EOT) is the protocol for DGames. It helps game developers to build blockchain games easily and quickly. EON Protocol uses a layer 2 solution to help DGames run smoothly as if on traditional web hosting. It also helps DGames to support different public chains, cryptocurrencies and digital assets.
overview.zh: 在区块链3.0时代，EON Protocol (EOT)致力于用区块链游戏来普及数字货币。EON Protocol采用基于layer 2的on-chain/off-chain技术架构来解决扩容问题，并帮助dgame游戏开发者快速支持多种公链的数字货币，以及帮助游戏资产上链。
